input:
On the nightstand, there is a silver jug, a blue pair of sunglasses, a fuchsia stress ball, and a purple sheet of paper. What color is the stress ball?
Options:
(A) red
(B) orange
(C) yellow
(D) green
(E) blue
(F) brown
(G) magenta
(H) fuchsia
(I) mauve
(J) teal
(K) turquoise
(L) burgundy
(M) silver
(N) gold
(O) black
(P) grey
(Q) purple
(R) pink
